name: ElevenLabs Voice Isolator
author: Shinkai
description: Isolates audio from YouTube videos or processes local audio files using ElevenLabs API.

ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.description: The API key for accessing ElevenLabs services

audio_file.description: The path to the local audio file to process

youtube_url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to download audio from

fileName.description: The desired name for the output audio file

audio_file.description: The path to the output audio file

characters_used.description: The number of characters used in the ElevenLabs API

characters_remaining.description: The number of characters remaining in the ElevenLabs API limit
